ucichess

Class ChessBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • ucichess.ChessBoard

  • public final class ChessBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    A representation of a virtual chessboard
    Author:
    tondeur herve 2015 GPL V3.0

    • Method Detail

      • moveFromFEN

        public static java.lang.String moveFromFEN(java.lang.String startFEN,
                                           java.lang.String move)
        Apply a move on a fen string.
        Parameters:
        startFEN - start position in FEN format
        move - A move in Algebraic Notation.
        Returns:
        A String containing the new FEN format.

      • show_chessboard

        public static void show_chessboard()
        draw the chessboard on an out console Black ChessBoard are represented by # character
        White ChessBoard by a space charactere.
        I keep conventionnal notation for chess piece
        r black root
        n black knight
        b black bishop
        q black queen
        k black king
        p black pawn
        R white Root
        N white Knight
        B white Bishop
        Q white Queen
        K white King
        P white Pawn

      • assign_chessboard

        public static java.lang.String[][] assign_chessboard(java.lang.String lineFEN)
        Assign a string FEN format to a virtual chessboard
        Call this method before using show_chessboard() method.
        Parameters:
        lineFEN - A string containing a FEN position
        Returns:
        A Sring Array 8x8 that represent the chessboard coordinate (base 0)

      • moveToCoord

        public static void moveToCoord(java.lang.String move)
        Convert a string chessboard coordinate into a numeric convention. ie e2e4 give 5 2 5 4
        Parameters:
        move - A String with ChessBoard coordonate.

      • coordToMove

        public static java.lang.String coordToMove(int cFrom,
                                           int rFrom,
                                           int cTo,
                                           int rTo,
                                           java.lang.String promotion)
        convert chessboard coordinate to algebraic notation move
        take care to promote event.
        Parameters:
        cFrom - number of the column from where the move begin
        rFrom - number of the row from where the move begin
        cTo - number of the column to where the move finish
        rTo - number of the row to where the move finish
        promotion - give the promotion letter rnbq RNBQ
        Returns:
        A String contains the move in algebraic notation.

      • getRowFrom

        public static int getRowFrom()
        Get Row-From coordanate using convention * a=1;b=2;c=3;d=4;e=5;f=6;g=7;h=8
        Returns:
        An integer

        public static int getColFrom()

        An integer

      • get_list_of_valid_moves

        public static java.util.ArrayList<ChessBoard.Position> get_list_of_valid_moves(java.lang.String fen,
                                                                               int colPiece,
                                                                               int rowPiece)
        Get a complete list of valid move for the piece in the FEN chess proposed.
        Parameters:
        fen - Give the fen format chessboard position
        colPiece - Give the column number for the piece to analyse
        rowPiece - give the row number for the piece to analyse
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Position Object with all valid moves.
